overview: Dr. Fabijanski has over 20 years experience in agribusiness with proven record of managing teams focused on novel trait and technology development. He has extensive experience in managing the development of GM plants and experience in the crop regulations pathway. He is the current Chair of the Ag-Nutrition Advisory Board of Biotech Canada. Throughout his history in the industry, Dr. Fabijanski has participated in the development of regulations for GM crops and regulatory reform. Dr. Fabijanski has independently consulted to companies, government organizations and scientific institutes working in the field of agricultural biotechnology. Dr. Fabijanski has held the position of President of the FAAR Biotechnology Group Inc., a technology and business development group with emphasis on ag-biotechnology assessment and management from 1992 - 2007, Research Director at Paladin Hybrids Inc., a company focused on the development of hybrid oilseeds from 1986-1992; and the Program Manager of two crop genome mapping programs for plant breeding applications in cereals and oilseeds from 1983 - 1986. Dr. Fabijanski holds 17 issued US patents related to the development of GM crops. Dr. Fabijanski received his Ph.D. in Cellular and Molecular Biology from the University of Southern California.
